name: Palak Paneer
cooking_details: Heat oil in a pan. Add onions, ginger, and garlic and cook until onions are golden brown. Add spinach and cook until wilted. Add paneer, salt, and garam masala and cook until heated through.

name: Chana Masala
cooking_details: Heat oil in a pan. Add cumin seeds and cook until fragrant. Add onions, ginger, and garlic and cook until onions are golden brown. Add tomatoes, spices, and chickpeas and simmer for 10-15 minutes.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
cooking_details: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 1 hour. Grill or broil chicken until cooked through. Heat oil in a pan. Add onions, ginger, and garlic and cook until onions are golden brown. Add tomatoes, spices, and cream and simmer for 10-15 minutes. Add cooked chicken and simmer for an additional 5-10 minutes.
